    • Method Detail

      • originals

        public static scala.collection.mutable.Map<Object,scala.ref.WeakReference<Accumulable<?,?>>> originals()
        This global map holds the original accumulator objects that are created on the driver. It keeps weak references to these objects so that accumulators can be garbage-collected once the RDDs and user-code that reference them are cleaned up.

      • newId
